name: Double Dragon
storyline: The Beat-them-all clearly reflects the intention of the genre! Hit them all! What a program! And Double Dragon has decided to take the maxim to its climax. Two brothers see the girlfriend of one of them kidnapped by a New York gang. For what ? How ? Is this really important? They will take justice into their own hands! So let's go for the tatane blows and the well-felt nose blows. The title innovated by offering a two-player cooperative mode, which was very successful. Unfortunately, the conversion, although acceptable for PCs of the time, does not equal the original arcade version. The best version undoubtedly remains the Nes version which managed to transcribe almost as well the pleasure that could be had in the arcades.
